thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Amogh
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Amogh

author: Amogh
title: Amogh
text:
Looking at Omega's online reviews and ratings I hired 2 cars from Omega, - 1 for the North Island and 1 for the South Island. I was happy with both the cars. Their service was excellent. The price offered by Omega is also good. They had an option of a car, where they did not charge for hiring a car for '1-way' (i.e. pick up at Queenstown, and drop at Christchurch). Some other car rental companies were charging $ 200 for the same. They also cooperated after my car-hire with a refund issue that was actually at my bank's end.
Hope they continue with the same spirit! Would surely hire Omega whenever I visit New Zealand again.
